fields.name: Character
fields.description: The character code used within the City’s finance and accounting system to classify the general type of payment or other financial transaction.

fields.name: Character Title
fields.description: The character code title used within the City’s finance and accounting system to classify the type of payment or other financial transaction within general categories.

fields.name: Check Date
fields.description: Date that the check or ACH (direct deposit) payment was made.

fields.name: Contract Description
fields.description: A short description of the contract.

fields.name: Contract Number
fields.description: The contract number associated with payments made to vendors who have a contract with the City.

fields.name: Department Title
fields.description: The department title used in the City’s finance and accounting system. These title may differ from those used on the City’s website.

fields.name: Deptartment
fields.description: The department number used in the City’s finance and accounting system.

fields.name: Document Reference Number Prefix
fields.description: The four letter document reference number prefix.

fields.name: Document Reference Number Prefix Definition
fields.description: The document reference number prefix definition which provides additional information about the payment type.

fields.name: Document Number
fields.description: The unique identifier used to track individual payments in the City’s finance and accounting system. These are not the same as check numbers.

fields.name: Fiscal Month
fields.description: Month in which the payment was made. Fiscal month 1 is July, fiscal month 2 is August, etc.

fields.name: Fiscal Year
fields.description: Year in which the payment was made. The fiscal year runs from July 1st through June 30th.

fields.name: Sub Object Code
fields.description: The sub-object code used within the City’s finance and accounting system to classify the type of payment or other financial transaction within more specific categories.

fields.name: Sub Object Code Title
fields.description: The sub-object code title used within the City’s finance and accounting system to classify the type of payment or other financial transaction within more specific categories.

fields.name: Transaction Amount
fields.description: The amount of the transaction or payment. (USD$)

fields.name: Vendor Name
fields.description: The name of the individual, vendor, or entity that the payment was made out to.
